Package arc.assets.loaders

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileHandleResolver
    Interface for classes the can map a file name to a Fi.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssetLoader<T,​P extends AssetLoaderParameters<T>>
    Abstract base class for asset loaders.
    AsynchronousAssetLoader<T,​P extends AssetLoaderParameters<T>>
    Base class for asynchronous AssetLoader instances.
    CubemapLoader
    AssetLoader for Cubemap instances.
    CubemapLoader.CubemapLoaderInfo  
    CubemapLoader.CubemapParameter  
    CustomLoader  
    FontLoader
    AssetLoader for Font instances.
    FontLoader.FontParameter
    Parameter to be passed to AssetManager.load(String, Class, AssetLoaderParameters) if additional configuration is necessary for the Font.
    I18NBundleLoader
    AssetLoader for I18NBundle instances.
    I18NBundleLoader.I18NBundleParameter  
    MusicLoader
    AssetLoader for Music instances.
    MusicLoader.MusicParameter  
    PixmapLoader
    AssetLoader for Pixmap instances.
    PixmapLoader.PixmapParameter  
    ShaderProgramLoader
    AssetLoader for Shader instances loaded from text files.
    ShaderProgramLoader.ShaderProgramParameter  
    SoundLoader
    AssetLoader to load Sound instances.
    SoundLoader.SoundParameter  
    SynchronousAssetLoader<T,​P extends AssetLoaderParameters<T>>  
    TextureAtlasLoader
    AssetLoader to load TextureAtlas instances.
    TextureAtlasLoader.TextureAtlasParameter  
    TextureLoader
    AssetLoader for Texture instances.
    TextureLoader.TextureLoaderInfo  
    TextureLoader.TextureParameter
